name: rows
description: Image contains rows library (with all available plugins), its command-line interface and IPython
full_description:
Create a directory to put your files in:
```bash
mkdir -p data
echo -e "a,b\n1,2\n3,4" > data/test.csv
```

Run the IPython shell inside rows image, sharing the created directory:
```bash
docker run --rm -it -v $(pwd)/data:/data turicas/rows:0.4.0 ipython
```

Access the command-line interface:
```bash
docker run --rm -it -v $(pwd)/data:/data turicas/rows:0.4.0 rows print /data/test.csv
```

Read the documentation to learn more about the [rows library](http://turicas.info/rows) and [rows command-line interface](http://turicas.info/rows/cli).
